TextView.android:text:
The opinion bars are generated based on the results of the quiz and the votes the MP has cast.

 The bar below is split down in to total votes covered within that subject. 

 For instance the bar below may well be split down into 6 separate votes on the subject, represented by 6 different questions within the quiz.

 - The green part of the bar represents votes/questions that you and the MP agree on.

 - The gray part of the bar represents votes/questions that either the MP or yourself have not given an opinion on and therefor we cannot see if you have agreed.

 - The red part of the bar represents votes/questions that you and the MP disagree on.

 If you or the MP do not have an opinion on any of the votes/questions within the given subject the bar will not be displayed.
